decodeCharacter(PushbackString) - Method in class org.owasp.esapi.codecs.CSSCodec
Returns the decoded version of the next character from the input string and advances the current character in the PushbackString. If the current character is not encoded, this method MUST reset the PushbackString. Returns the decoded version of the character starting at index, or null if no decoding is possible.
decodeCharacter(PushbackString) - Method in interface org.owasp.esapi.codecs.Codec
Returns the decoded version of the next character from the input string and advances the current character in the PushbackString.
